ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1273
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, that s a good one.  Every time I play bards come along that think they can do my job better than me (70 monk, 7 years, not bad at pulling). What I really
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, that's a good one. Every time I play bards come
along that think they can do my job better than me (70
monk, 7 years, not bad at pulling).

What I really love is when warriors start pulling. I
let the group just die when they pull trains.

Quwi

--- Rick Corriveau <rickcorriveau@...> wrote:

> I agree with you about grping with peeps who do not
> know how to play their class. What kills me is
> someone in the grp who doesn't even play YOUR class
> yet they insist your playing your character wrong.
> <sigh> Oh well.
>
> I play on fennon-ro
> 63rd Cleric--Lifesphere
> 61st Enchanter--Mindmender
> 57th Necro-------Deathticket
> 55th Druid--------Leafskin
>
> Always looking for a good grp !!
>
> Look me up !!
>
> Lauriana Kanan <katjane3@...> wrote:
>
>
> hello just wanted to introduce myself also.
> been playing since aug of 99 have 2 accounts and
> about 11 chars. Only 2 are high levels everyone else
> is in 30's-40's and some newbies. SInce I have so
> many different classes I am always looking for ways
> to learn about them. Nothing irks me more than to
> get in a group with someone who doesnt know how to
> play their class. I am always open for advice and
> guidance.
>
>
>
> Lauriana Kanan'venomblade
